## ThemeLoadOptions.resolveIncludeUris property

Resolve the URIs of inherited themes (using `extends` feature). If true, \[\[uriResolver\]\] will be used to resolve the URI  true

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveIncludeUris?: boolean;
```
